title: spiced roll with brandy icing
description: These spiced, boozy Christmas buns are the perfect mid-morning or mid-afternoon festive treat. Equipment and preparation: For this recipe, you will need a free-standing food mixer fitted with a dough hook and a round 23cm/9in spring form tin.
ingredients: 625g/1lb 7oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
500g/1lb 2oz chilled butter, sliced into 1cm/½in-thick rectangles, plus extra for greasing
